code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import Input from"../components/Input";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/global.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const login=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login",{email,password},{withCredentials:true});localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.access_token);navigate("/dashboard");}catch(err){alert("Login failed");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{minHeight:"100vh",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",background:"#f5f2ef"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{width:"100%",maxWidth:"400px",padding:"2rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginBottom:"1.5rem",fontSize:"1.5rem",textAlign:"center"},children:"Log ind"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{label:"Email",type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{label:"Adgangskode",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:login,className:"btn",style:{marginTop:"1rem",width:"100%"},children:"Log ind"})]})});};export default Login;
